key.name: timer-enabled
key.description: Whether the flash timer is currently active

key.name: flash-mode
key.description: 0 = entire top bar, 1 = panel indicator only

key.name: flash-duration
key.description: Duration of each flash in milliseconds (100-2000)

key.name: flash-count
key.description: Number of flash cycles per trigger (1-10)

key.name: flash-color
key.description: Color of the flash effect (CSS color value)

key.name: show-indicator
key.description: Show an indicator icon in the top panel
